Package org.openscience.cdk.modeling.forcefield

Interface Summary
IPotentialFunction Interface for a potential energy function to optimise in cdk/modeling/forcefield
 

Class Summary
AngleBending Angle bending calculator for the potential energy function.
BondStretching Bond Stretching calculator for the potential energy function.
ConjugateGradientMethod Find a decrease direction of the energy fuction from a point of the 3xN coordinates space using the conjugate gradient approach.
ElectrostaticInteractions MMFF94 Electrostatic Interactions energy.
ForceField To work with the coordinates of the molecule, like get the 3d coordinates of the atoms or calculate the distance between two atoms.
ForceFieldTools To work with the coordinates of the molecule, like get the 3d coordinates of the atoms or calculate the distance between two atoms.
GeometricMinimizer Call the minimization methods.
LineSearch The LineSearch class include the first and second step of the line search approach: Bracket the minimum and interpolation.
LineSearchForTheWolfeConditions  
MMFF94EnergyFunction MMFF94 energy function.
NewtonRaphsonMethod Methods of Newton-Raphson approach.
SmoothingFunctions Cutoffs and Smoothing Functions.
SteepestDescentsMethod Find a direction from a point of the coordinates space using the steepest descents approach.
StretchBendInteractions Stretch-Bend Interaction calculator for the potential energy function.
Torsions Torsions calculator for the potential energy function.
VanDerWaalsInteractions Van Der Waals Interactions calculator for the potential energy function.
